message_1:
How many residents in a city have an annual salary of less than $50,000 based on the following data set?

Salary (in thousands of dollars): $26, $36, $48, $52, $42, $28, $55, $43, $45, $38, $41, $29, $47, $36, $51, $44, $39, $49, $27, $30
message_2:
To find out how many residents have an annual salary of less than $50,000, we need to count the number of salaries in the data set that are less than $50,000.

Here is the list of salaries less than $50,000:

$26, $36, $48, $42, $28, $43, $45, $38, $41, $29, $47, $36, $44, $39, $49, $27, $30

There are 17 residents with an annual salary of less than $50,000.
